name: c4vxl cloud
description: c4vxl cloud is a free to use cloud Platform where you can store your data easily and secure

features.name: Friend System
features.description: With our intuitive friend system, connecting and collaborating has never been easier. Share files effortlessly with your trusted network of friends directly from our Cloud Platform.

features.name: Backup System
features.description: Safeguard your important data and never worry about data loss again. Navigate to our backup page and effortlessly create backups of your important files with just a few clicks.

features.name: Account System
features.description: Tailor your profile to reflect your unique identity and preferences. Upload a profile picture to add a personal touch, change your username to make it uniquely yours, and set a brief description to share more about yourself with the community.
